uk.ac.ed.inf.powergrab

Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ed.inf.powergrab.Map

  • public class Map
extends java.lang.Object
    The game map stores all charger information and provides methods to query them efficiently.

    A map can be constructed from a GeoJson FeatureCollection. users can provides a featureCollection or a date, the map can automatically download it according the date. Different query method also defined in this class, drones can express their strategies intuitively by them.

    Since:
    0.1
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Tai Yintao s1891075@ed.ac.uk

    • Constructor Detail

      • Map

        public Map(com.mapbox.geojson.FeatureCollection featureMap)
        Constructs a map from a GeoJson FeatureCollection.
        Parameters:
        featureMap - a GeoJson FeatureCollection with 50 chargers information.

      • Map

        public Map(int year,
           int month,
           int day)
    throws java.io.IOException
        Constructs a map with a given date.

        The constructor download the map GeoJson file from http://homepages.inf.ed.ac.uk/stg/powergrab, then analyze the file and initialize chargers.

        Parameters:
        year - the year of the map.
        month - the month of the map.
        day - the date of the map in a month.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - throw the error if anything wrong.

    • Method Detail

      • nearestPositiveCharger

        public Charger nearestPositiveCharger(Position pos)
        Find the nearest positive charger of a position.
        Parameters:
        pos - the position we are currently considering.
        Returns:
        return the nearest positive charger, if no positive charger, return null.

      • nearestCharger

        public Charger nearestCharger(Position pos)
        Find the nearest charger of a position.
        Parameters:
        pos - the position we are currently considering.
        Returns:
        return the nearest charger.

      • connectedCharger

        public Charger connectedCharger(Position pos)
        Find the connected charger of a position if it has.
        Parameters:
        pos - the position we are currently considering.
        Returns:
        return the connected charger. If no charger connected, return false

      • reader

        private static java.lang.String reader(java.io.InputStream in)
                                throws java.io.IOException
        Read the contents from a input stream, and return it as a string.
        Parameters:
        in - the input stream.
        Returns:
        return the contents as a string.
        Throws:

      • fromFeatures

        private void fromFeatures(com.mapbox.geojson.FeatureCollection featureMap)
        Extract the charger information from a GeoJson FeatureCollection.

        Extract latitude, longitude, coin and power information of chargers, and initialize chargers then add to the chargers list.

        Parameters:
        featureMap - a GeoJson FeatureCollection with 50 charger information
